name: Out of The Boxes
description:
You play as an compulsive buyer, starting to regret all his stupid purchases online, now that his studio flat is literally buried under packages. Your goal is to sort and group all theses packages, faster than they are delivered at your door. Think fast under pressure and try not to get stuck in the cardboard labyrinth you're creating.

For the sake of comparison, imagine a game feel somewhere between MiniMetro, Twelve Minutes, Sokoban and a Rubik's Cube.

This is my entry for the Epic MegaJam 2021: a game I developed as a solo developer in 72 hours.
